title: No third-parties access to your data without a duly authorized judicial Swiss warrant

tosdr.case: no third-party access without a warrant
tosdr.tldr: “This Service is subject to the national laws of Switzerland and we do our best to provide you with the maximum level of privacy in this legislation. That means there will be no access to your data by third parties without a duly authorized warrant issued by a Swiss judge.”
